name: SUPERSTAR LAPONE
description:
【The SUPERSTAR series has been downloaded more than 81 million times worldwide!】

▼What is SUPERSTAR LAPONE
You can play rhythm games from debut songs to the latest songs
The Official LAPONE ENTERTAINMENT Rhythm Game!
More than 80 card types!

▼Endless ways to play
You can choose your favorite music and play!
You can also enjoy collecting your favorite cards!
You can enhance your cards and aim for a high score!
Fans can also compete with each other for ranking!

▼Participating Artists
JO1 / INI

▼Check out the official Twitter for the latest news!
https://twitter.com/SS_LAPONE


*"SUPERSTAR LAPONE" is completely free to play but some in-game items will require payment.
